title: Beetle Infestation Threatens Hungary’s Oldest Library
description: Hungary’s 1,000‑year‑old Pannonhalma Archabbey is scrambling to disinfect and preserve tens of thousands of historic books from a destructive beetle infestation that could wipe out centuries of history. What do you think? The post Beetle Infestation Threatens Hungary’s Oldest Library appeared first on The Onion.
author: The Onion Staff
excerpt: Hungary’s 1,000‑year‑old Pannonhalma Archabbey is scrambling to disinfect and preserve tens of thousands of historic books from a destructive beetle infestation that could wipe out centuries of history. What do you think?
text: Hungary’s 1,000‑year‑old Pannonhalma Archabbey is scrambling to disinfect and preserve tens of thousands of historic books from a destructive beetle infestation that could wipe out centuries of history. What do you think? “What books did they eat? I’m looking for recommendations.” Elliott Wege, Remote Programmer “I have a bunch of old Nora Roberts books I’m trying to unload, if the beetles are interested.” Becca Moen, Crossword Analyst “Nothing beats that old book taste.” Josh Donsel, Geode Curator Like A Vitamin You Ingest With Your Eyes. html:
Hungary’s 1,000‑year‑old Pannonhalma Archabbey is scrambling to disinfect and preserve tens of thousands of historic books from a destructive beetle infestation that could wipe out centuries of history. What do you think?

“What books did they eat? I’m looking for recommendations.”

Elliott Wege, Remote Programmer

“I have a bunch of old Nora Roberts books I’m trying to unload, if the beetles are interested.”

Becca Moen, Crossword Analyst

“Nothing beats that old book taste.”

Josh Donsel, Geode Curator

Like A Vitamin You Ingest With Your Eyes. Get The Onion Newsletter.

"*" indicates required fields
